BlackNightmare:

"No yet but be ready"said cooly the femme"We must to be patient if 
we like to strike in the right moment"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "The Ultimate Archfiend of Darkness, 
Devouring" <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> Necross/ Splattercannon/ ????:
> 
> "Transmission confirmed," Splattercannon responded, picking up on 
the 
> two Maximals.
> 
> "Alright then.  Let's get this show started.  Time to show which 
> universal entity is in charge around here!" Necross said, 
preparing 
> his missile and acid blasters.
> 
> "Well get it over with then," the sixth minion said, her cool 
smooth 
> voice sounding annoyed,"Unicron is starting to get impatient!"
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare/Darkfate/Nightstrike::
>  
> "Be ready to shoot at my signal"said the femme by com link to all 
> Unicron's minions there , using a frequency that just them could 
> pick up.
>  
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> Necross:
>   
> "Ah, I see them now.  Let's go pay them a visit."
> Necross decended through the clouds, his arms crossed over his 
> chest.  He continued to decend, until he could see Splattercannon, 
> Nightstrike, and the two Maximals.  He devilishly grinned, and 
> waited for them to enter his attack range.
